column2: an A.M. Eatery////We were starving by the time we got seated at our table
column3: and we ordered a tremendous amount of food for just the two of us LOL :). I got the Caprese Benedict and the eggs were perfectly poached
column4: and the hollandaise was just perfect. And
column5: the hash browns wrote the perfect ode to the potatoes :). My roommate got the Fall greens salad and it was a very hearty salad. But the icing on the cake (literally) was the flight of pancakes we ordered (pineapple upside down
column7: and peanut butter cup). All three were out of the world
column8: and the amount of sweetness in them was just perfect!! The flight of pancakes is a MUST-TRY!!!
